DOC.brief_title: Identification Obese Patients Mechanism Involved Intramuscular Lipid Accumulation
DOC.detailed_description: Obese insulin sensitive obese insulin resistant patient undergo glucose tolerance test , indirect calorimetry exercise muscular biopsy .
DOC.criteria: Obese patient Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 30 40 kg/m2 Patients practice physical exercise ( Voorips index < 9 ) Age 40 70 year Male gender Fast blood glucose < 1,10 g/l hypoglycemic treatment Signed informed consent Social security affiliation Absence anti VIH , anti hepatitis C antibody , HBS antigen Normal biological test Non smoke person Patients refuse antiVIH , antihepatitis C antibody , HBS antigens test Patients treat anticoagulant , b blocker , lipopenic , antiinflammatory . Patients contraindication muscular exercise ( retinopathy , coronaropathy , nephropathy ) muscular biopsy Allergy local anaesthetic
